message.content: {"id": "6125", "title": "Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late", "description": "When pressing finish in the JAR packager wizard, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.", "OB": "The JAR packager should not allow creating a JAR file with unsaved editors.", "EB": "To address this issue, the JAR packager should provide an option to allow saving unsaved editors before creating the JAR file. Alternatively, the packager can automatically save the unsaved editors before the JAR creation process.", "SR": "Update the JAR packager to either prompt the user to save unsaved editors before JAR creation or automatically save the unsaved editors before beginning the JAR creation process."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

", 'OB': '', 'EB': 'To save, I have to quit the wizard, save, open the wizard again and thenenter all fields again I should be allowed to create a JAR with unsaved editors If not, there should be a dialog to allow saving ', 'SR': ''}
